name: escarole
content:

a type of endive or chicory (= a plant with a slightly bitter taste that is eaten uncooked in salads or as a vegetable) with wide, curly green leaves: I chose a salad of escarole with goat's cheese and hazelnuts. Add a drained can of chickpeas and the coarsely chopped escarole. Compare
endive
chicory
frisée
